title: Cobalt Blue
description: Sachin Kundalkar started on his first novel at 20 and finished it when he was 22. The novel was Cobalt Blue, the story of a brother and sister who fall in love with the same man, and how a traditional Marathi family is shattered by the ensuing events â€“ a work that both shocked and spoke to Marathi readers.
author: Sachin Kundalkar
